title: Understanding Relative Frequency
text: Relative frequency is the ratio of the number of times a specific event occurs to the total number of events. It helps compare different categories.

title: Calculate Relative Frequency for Dogs
text: To find the relative frequency of people who prefer dogs, divide the number of people who prefer dogs by the total number of people surveyed.

title: Calculate Relative Frequency for Cats
text: Similarly, calculate the relative frequency for cats by dividing the number of people who prefer cats by the total number of people surveyed.

title: Compare the Relative Frequencies
text: Compare the relative frequencies of people who prefer dogs and cats. Is the frequency for dogs less than that for cats?
